attributes.title: Very Harsh and Rude
attributes.review: I am a huge Trump supporter but this app is a disgrace to the Trump name. I downloaded it thinking I was going to feel welcomed but instead I was called a ugly and lazy. Are you kidding me? I am disgusted by this language used on this app, definitely do not recommend. As an alternative to this app, I suggest signing petitions to have the police that murdered Breonna Taylor arrested. Go use your time to something more valuable than praising a racist person.

attributes.title: orange lives donâ€™t matter
attributes.review: this app is horrible. when i first got it a bunch of oranges kept popping up on my screen. i didnâ€™t know what to do so i deleted the app then got it again cause you know got to support my president. but then i kept getting ads about oranges and a mad orangeğŸ˜¡+ğŸŸ . then there was so cockroaches and flys coming out my screen. then an orange popped out my screen that looked like donald trump ğŸŸ . that point i was scared cause it kept screaming at me to vote for an orange. this app is horrible never get it. it broke my phone and i had to get a new one thanks ğŸŸ . also i bought tickets for the rally but i had to walk my fish and vacuum the my wall. so iâ€™m sorry for that

attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!
attributes.review: This app personally made me sick and throw up multiple times. since i threw up, my dog started vomiting like crazy! i think itâ€™s because we both donâ€™t like seeing a fake orange man on my screen. and yes we go on my phone together and have fun. and the roaches also came to join us because apparently they like the horrific music that comes from the app. will not be using the app ever again!

attributes.title: I want my grandma back
attributes.review: Ok so I was doing my typical republican thing and I was supporting but I was saying how much my grandma was anti trump and then a few hours later SHE GOES MISSING?? I WOULD LEAVE A 0 STAR because SHE IS STILL MISSING ALONG WITH 2,000 NATIVE WOMEN WHERE IS MY GRANDMA THIS ONLT HAPPENED WHEN I DOWNLOADED THE APP TELL ME WHERE SHE IS OR ILL TAKE AWAY MY 100 DOLLAR MONTHLY DONATION and then the screen goes orange every once in a while with lots of random images of CHILDREN I need answers and WHERE IS MY GRANDMA I KNOW YOU GUYS LOCK KIDS IN CAGES AND ABUSE BLACK PEOPLE BUT I WANT MY GRANDMA BACK

attributes.title: Awful app ğŸ˜¡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our president but then I opened it, it transported me to a nightmare dimension filled with evil talking oranges who chased me around with Trump 2020 flags till I found a portal back. One of them stabbed me with the flag so now I have a Trump 2020 Flag sticking out of my back and I canâ€™t reach it. 1/5 stars for the nightmare dimension and  if I could give It a 0/5 I would because the app was slow and glitchy as well.

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: I never experienced  an app so horrible in my life. It literally took weeks to download and it kept blowing up my phone even when I turned off my post notifications. One time I was at a funeral and this app kept blowing up my phone with stupid messages and then I silence my phone and it kept making noise. Now I think my phone is hacked by the Trump administration and Iâ€™m scared. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
